DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine difference post-operative voiding function subject receive local anesthetic receive placebo time mid-urethral sling placement . The secondary objective evaluate pain procedure two group .
DOC.brief_title: Voiding Function After Mid-Urethral Slings With Without Local Anesthetic : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Scheduled undergo midurethral sling incontinence without concomitant procedure Undergoing procedure addition sling Not competent give consent Using intermittent self catheterization preoperatively Known allergy local anesthetic Undergoing spinal anesthesia procedure Prisoners NonEnglish speaker Under 18 year age Has condition would contraindicate use local anesthetic epinephrine
